channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell EMC -- iDRAC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell EMC -- iDRAC

item.title: CVE-2019-3705|2024-08-04T19:19:17.425Z -- dell%20emc -- idrac
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC6 versions prior to 2.92, iDRAC7/iDRAC8 versions prior to 2.61.60.60, and iDRAC9 versions prior to 3.20.21.20, 3.21.24.22, 3.21.26.22 and 3.23.23.23 contain a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to crash the webserver or execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the webserver by sending specially crafted input data to the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2019-3706|2024-08-04T19:19:17.489Z -- dell%20emc -- idrac
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 3.24.24.24, 3.21.26.22, 3.22.22.22 and 3.21.25.22 contain an authentication bypass vulnerability. A remote attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and gain access to the system by sending specially crafted data to the iDRAC web interface.

item.title: CVE-2019-3707|2024-08-04T19:19:17.547Z -- dell%20emc -- idrac
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 3.30.30.30 contain an authentication bypass vulnerability. A remote attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and gain access to the system by sending specially crafted input data to the WS-MAN interface.
